Row.Text: Akitsumaru unique building that replaces Armory. +3 [ICON_Production] Production, +1 [ICON_Science] Science. All strategic resources gain +1 [ICON_Production] Production. +50% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10.
Akitsumaru unique Modern era melee unit that replaces the Infantry. +5 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points for killing units.[NEWLINE]No need strategic resources.
